title: Can we walk with the thoughts of Lord Rama in this Kali Yuga? - Quora

response.answer_text: SURE. WHY NOT????? LORD RAMA IS A DHARMIC PERSON HONESTLY, VERY FEW PEOPLE IN THIS KALI YUGA ARE TOTALLY DHARMIC WHILE OTHERS ARE NOT  JAI SHRI RAM

Absolutely. Everything known in Indian scriptures is valid throughout the whole universe itself. Yes, the one on the right path always wins! It may not be instantly, but the final outcome will be the victory of a person who has moral values and follows dharma. This is valid in every yuga. It doesn’t change with time.
